name: Carriode Raiders
effect: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Add a fire token to your location on the map.

name: Incense
effect: Unleash twice. Any player suffers 1 damage. OR Gravehold suffers 5 damage. Add 2 fire tokens to your location on the map.

name: Spreading Brushfire
effect:
To discard: Spend 7 Æ.
Power 2: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Add a fire token to your location on the map.

name: Blacken
effect:
Unleash twice.
Gravehold suffers 5 damage.
If there are 4 or less fire tokens on your location of the map, add 2 fire tokens to your location on the map.

name: Breach Shatter
effect:
To discard: Spend 8 Æ.
Power 2: Unleash twice. The player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.
If that player becomes exhausted because of this, that mage is severed and cross out this sentence.

name: Chitin Killer
effect: Persistent: The player with the most prepped spells suffers 3 damage. If that player becomes exhausted because of this, that mage is severed and cross out this sentence.

name: Magma Lord Zala
effect: Persistent: Gravehold and any player each suffer 2 damage. Add a fire token to your location of the map.

name: Soul Rend
effect:
To discard: Spend 9 Æ.
Power 2: Unleash three times, and add 2 fire tokens to your location on the map. OR Unleash twice, the player with the lowest life suffers 1 damage, their mage becomes severed, and cross out this sentence.

name: Stifle
effect:
Unleash twice. The player with the lowest life suffers 3 damage.
If that player becomes exhausted because of this, that mage is severed and cross out this sentence.

name: Dread Ignition
effect: Power 1: Unleash twice, and the player with the most charges suffers 3 damage and loses all of their charges. OR Gravehold suffers 5 damage, and add 2 fire tokens to your location on the map.

name: Explosion
effect:
Unleash three times.
The players collectively discard the two most expensive cards in hand.
Add 2 fire tokens to your location on the map.

name: InescapableTorment
effect: Power 2: The player with the highest life suffers damage equal to their life.

name: Nyx of Burning Bones
effect: Persistent: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 2 damage. Add a fire token to your location on the map.

name: Ravage
effect: Unleash four times. OR Add three fire tokens to your location on the map. OR Gravehold suffers 7 damage.

name: Revive
effect:
Unleash twice.
Place the most recently discarded minion in the nemesis discard pile into play.

name: The Ceaseless Observer
effect: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. Add fire tokens to your location on the map equal to the number of shield tokens on this minion.
